chapters.title: The Birth of Digital Finance
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the early developments and pioneering efforts that laid the foundation for digital finance.

chapters.title: Evolution of Electronic Banking
chapters.summary: This chapter delves into the history and evolution of electronic banking, from ATMs to internet banking.

chapters.title: The Rise of Online Transactions
chapters.summary: This chapter discusses the emergence and growth of online transactions, including e-commerce and digital payments.

chapters.title: Key Milestones in Digital Finance
chapters.summary: This chapter highlights significant milestones and innovations that have shaped the landscape of digital finance.
